Transportation Planning of Smart City on the Basis of Data Augmentation Design Under the Perspective of Humanism: A Case Study of Fuzhou’S Cangshan District
item.description:
The papers won the National Third Prize during the “Smart City” Special Competition of 14th “Challenge Cup” National College Student Curricular Academic Science and Technology Works Competition.

Under the storm of global informatization, development of smart city draws much attention and smart transportation is the root. For the city of Fuzhou’s Cangsang district is one of the earliest pilot smart cities and the place to hold the national youth games, this study takes it as the target area and makes a transportation plan based on data augmentation design.

item.title: Geovisualization
item.description:
We will visualize the geographical features by R packages/Python library.

Remap(in R)

demo

The case study is visualization of the geographical tribune of youth.

Folium(in Python)

We visualize the raster(wind speed in Tibet) by folium.

item.title: Note of Applied Statistics with R
item.description:
Book

In big data era, statistical theory is still meaningful. What’s deep learning study? “import tensorflow as tf”. Without basic statistical theory, we could not complete a very good study of deep learning or machine learning.

Acknowledge

We thanks Mr.Wang(CV) and her lessons: applied stastistics in University of Chinese Academic Sciences.

Reference

Junping Jia, Statistics (Fifth Edition), Renmin University of China Press, 2012. Xiaoqun He, Multivariate Statistical Analysis (3rd Edition), Renmin University Press, 2012.
